I have accumulated these skills by creating software projects inside and outside of university, and throughout the work experience in my life.

Work Experience

  • Bar Supervisor GlenGarry Castle Hotel 03/2022 - Present
    Working as a supervisor at a small pub in Darlington. This role involves alot of responsibility as I am typically the only staff member on so I must manage everything that happens in the pub. Responsibilities include Opening/Closing, Money handelling/till counting, staff and patron management and the responsible service of Alcohol.
  • Bar Staff GlenGarry Castle Hotel 02/2022 - 03/2022
    Working as general bar staff on busy days. Typically one of 2 staff on the bar.
  • Mathematics Tutor Independent 01/2021 - 12/2021
    Working as a Mathematics tutor for HSC mathematics advanced students, and as a science and maths tutor for a year 8 student. This role involved client relationship management as I was doing this independently.
  • Customer Sales Representative Glue Store - Miranda 06/2020 - 02/2021
    Working as a retail assistant for busy fashion store in a shopping center. This role involved meeting a multitude of sales quotas throughout the day by talking to customers and recognising what they were looking for.
  • Waiter JD's at Wooloware Golf Club 11/2018 - 06/2020
    Working as a waiter for a busy restruant at a public golf club. This was a position that involved team management and strong communication with other team members as it was typically very busy. This job also helped me to strengthen my adaptability.
  • Assistant Martial Arts Instructor Kinetic Martial Arts - Cronulla 04/2015 - 10/2019
    Working as a part of a team to teach kids from 4-12 martial arts. This role was probably the greatest contributor to my character today as it was my first job, and there was a strong sense of responsibility, dedication and structure to this role. It helped me to become patient, disciplined and communicative. There was a strong sense of leadership in this position as in the final year or so of being in this position I was taking my own class of 10-20 kids each week.
  • Kitchen Staff Mix Pizza Bar - Kirrawee 01/2018 - 11/2018
    Worked as a part of a pizza kitchen, typically working next to the business owner. This role helped me develop my hardworking attitude to work and my communication to others in my team.
